---
title: "`ramp.work`"
---

[**`ramp.work`**](https://dd-harp.github.io/ramp.work/) is an R-package available from github. To install the latest version of **`ramp.work`** from GitHub, run the following lines of code in an R session.

```{r, eval=F}
library(devtools)
devtools::install_github("dd-harp/ramp.work")
```

**`ramp.work`** depends on [**`ramp.xds`**](ramp.xds.html)
